author: gmsx
title: extremely nice - if you like (as I do) weird pieces in pink. Includes 2 minifigs
review:
I received this item from 1995 middle of October 2010... and it was an amazing gift from a friend.

Pros
Includes 1 male and one female minifigs
Very rare pieces in pink
Includes an exclusive FreeStyle Poster

Cons
There is never any cons for me, I will always complain I would want more pieces, but even the 5922-piece Taj Mahal was enough, I am very greedy Lego-wise...
